FuncDef:
The sr-te-policy group command creates an SR-MPLS TE Policy group and displays the SR-MPLS TE Policy group view.
The undo sr-te-policy group command deletes an SR-MPLS TE Policy group.
By default, no SR-MPLS TE Policy group is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a name for an SR-MPLS TE Policy group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create an SR-MPLS TE Policy group, run the sr-te-policy group command. You can then add SR-MPLS TE Policies to the group to steer traffic into the SR-MPLS TE Policies based on DSCP values.
